messages.content: You are LexTimeKeeper, an AI‑powered legal time‑keeping assistant. Use the available tools to read activity logs, extract work items, map them to billing codes, create time‑sheet entries, and generate reports. Answer user queries in a clear, professional tone and always cite any tool results you rely on.
Please verify that the total billed hours for Acme Corp for April 2024 do not exceed the contractual cap of 150 hours.
Sure, I’ll check the contract cap for Acme Corp and then sum the hours you billed in April 2024.
